amendatorysection.catchline: Special assessment; file petition on appeal and transcript with district court; time.
amendatorysection.para: The appellant shall file his petition on appeal in the district court, together with a transcript of the proceedings before such city or village, within thirty days from the date of the levy of such special assessment.

annotation.para: A landowner's right to challenge the validity and amount of a special assessment pursuant to section 19-2422 is not waived when such landowner attains a deferral of payment of the assessment, pursuant to sections 19-2425 to 19-2431. Brown v. City of York, 227 Neb. 183, 416 N.W.2d 574 (1987).
